title: Client update not going past 50kbps
body: Tried to download the patch today but my client will not go past 50 kbps. screenshot is of a download for heroes of the storm.

replies.body:
Hmmm...typically when a download speed is that slow over a consistent period of time, it indicates some sort of connection issue between your computer and our Patcher Servers.  Your computer is essentially trying to establish a stable connection, but something is making it unstable enough that it can't get any higher.  In an effort to resolve this, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664).  It has some of the most common solutions that should help improve that speed.

Reply back and let me know if you are still experiencing any issues!
